title: Ticket #5740: condor_who doesn't show docker universe jobs properly
description: When running docker universe jobs, condor_who reports the job id in the program column. This is because condor_who grovels through the debugging logs for source information, and docker universe formats these messages differently than vanilla universe. By adding some breadcrumbs, we can make condor_who work better for docker universe.
check_ins:
2016-Jun-20 16:25   Check-in [48597]: Document #5740 (By Greg Thain )
